title: For trade: Matty dark cap & white cap & tough Sov150 Rucker portrait
author: Luke

posts.post_title: For trade: Matty dark cap & white cap & tough Sov150 Rucker portrait
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

These Mattys are a little too rough for my condition requirements, so I'm looking to trade them for an equivalent value of cards that fit my collection a little better.  I also have a Sov150 Rucker available.

I'm looking for:
-crease-free (or almost crease-free) HOFers with common backs
-HOFers with tougher backs (condition not as important)
-mainly looking for the mid-tier HOFers like McGraw, Evers, Tinker, Brown, Baker, Crawford, Chance, Collins, Keeler.  But would also be interested in others potentially.  Also would love to trade both for a decent Cy Young if that possibility is out there.
-Also looking for 150/350 series players with Old Mill backs
-For Rucker, hoping to find an Old Mill or Sov150 back of a similarly tough player

Please let me know if you want to talk trade, or have any questions.  PM is fine, or email at [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]
Weekend bump before the Mattys go on ebay
